mvp_features.original_text: 10 core research slash commands for Claude Code

mvp_features.name: State Management & Checkpointing
mvp_features.original_text: Memory systems with rollback capability and state saves

mvp_features.name: Quality Control Framework
mvp_features.original_text: Multi-dimensional AI slop detection with validation gates
mvp_features.why_mvp: Prevents low-quality AI outputs and ensures research integrity

mvp_features.name: Research Workflow Engine
mvp_features.original_text: End-to-end research pipeline from ideation to publication

mvp_features.original_text: Complete artifact tracking and validation pipeline
